abstract: Amer Red Cross rept on aid extended to Eur
snippet: WASHINGTON, July 31 (AP)--The American Red Cross is rushing an average of 850,000 pounds of supplies daily to millions of suffering Europeans. Despite submarines, air bombers, blockades and mines, it has not lost a cargo....

headline.main: RED CROSS RUSHES SUPPLIES TO NEEDY; It Ships 850,000 Pounds Daily to Reach $8,000,000 Total Since the War Began NOT ONE CARGO WAS LOST Other Agencies Since September Received $8,384,095for Refugee Relief

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 31 (AP)--The American Red Cross is rushing an average of 850,000 pounds of supplies daily to millions of suffering Europeans. Despite submarines, air bombers, blockades and mines, it has not lost a cargo.
